name: Steel Longsword
description: A sturdy longsword made from high-quality steel.
looks: The steel longsword has a straight, double-edged blade with a simple crossguard. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skills.swordmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordmanship skill when wielded.

name: Iron Axe
description: A heavy iron axe with a wooden handle.
looks: The iron axe has a sharp, double-edged blade attached to a sturdy wooden handle. The blade has a dull silver color, and the handle has a polished sheen.

name: Staff of Fire
description: A staff imbued with the power of fire, allowing its wielder to unleash devastating fire-based attacks.
looks: The staff is made of a polished oak wood, with intricate carvings and a fiery red gemstone at the top. It radiates with a warm glow and flickers with flames.

special_weapon_skils.fire_magic: Increases effectiveness of fire magic spells.

special_effects.fireball: Allows the wielder to cast Fireball spell.

name: Wand of Fireball
description: A wand infused with the power of fire, allowing the user to cast fireballs.
looks: The wand is made of polished oak and is adorned with intricate carvings of flames. It has a smooth handle that fits comfortably in the hand.

special_weapon_skils.fire_magic: Allows the user to cast fire spells more effectively.

special_effects.fireball: Allows the user to cast the fireball spell, dealing fire damage to enemies.

name: Forest Bow
description: A hand-crafted bow made from sturdy wood, perfect for hunting in the forest.
looks: The Forest Bow is made from a single piece of dark, polished wood, with intricate carvings of leaves and animals along its length. It has a comfortable grip wrapped in soft leather, and a strong string made from sinew.

special_weapon_skills.archery: Improves accuracy and damage with bows

name: Dragonbone Sword
description: A mighty sword forged from the bones of a dragon. It radiates with a powerful aura, instilling fear into the hearts of enemies.
looks: The Dragonbone Sword has a long and slender blade made from pure dragonbone. The hilt is adorned with intricate engravings of dragons and is wrapped in fine leather. The pommel is shaped like a dragon's head with ruby eyes that glow with an otherworldly light.

name: Staff of the Elements
description: A powerful staff that channels the forces of the elements
looks: The staff is made of a sturdy wooden shaft with a crystal orb at the top. The orb is filled with swirling colors representing the different elements.

special_effects.elemental_mastery: Increases the power of elemental spells

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword suitable for close combat.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge and a sharp point. It has a hilt made of leather wrapped around the metal tang, providing a comfortable grip. The blade is engraved with intricate patterns and the pommel has a decorative design.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy sword made of steel.
looks: The steel sword has a straight blade with a silver shine. The hilt is made of black leather and has a simple crossguard.

special_weapon_skils.sword: Grants a bonus to Sword skill when used.

name: Steel Plate Armor
description: A heavy armor made from reinforced steel plates
looks: The armor is made up of thick, overlapping steel plates, covering the entire torso and extending down to the thighs. It also has sturdy shoulder and elbow guards.

name: Steel Shield
description: A sturdy shield made of steel, providing excellent defensive capabilities.
looks: The steel shield is a large, round shield made entirely of steel. It has a smooth surface, with a handle on the back for gripping and a metal rim around the edge.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic sword made of iron
looks: The iron sword has a simple and utilitarian design. Its blade is straight and double-edged, with a crossguard for hand protection. The handle is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

name: Steel Plate Armor
description: A heavy and durable armor made from steel plates
looks: The armor is made up of thick steel plates that encase the entire torso, legs, and arms. It has intricate engravings and decorative patterns along the edges, giving it a regal and intimidating appearance.

name: Scroll of Fireball
description: A magical scroll containing the Fireball spell. When used, it conjures a ball of fire that explodes upon impact.
looks: The scroll is made of aged parchment, with intricate symbols and runes etched onto the surface. It emits a faint glow, indicating its magical nature.

special_effects.explodes: The Fireball spell causes an explosive blast upon impact, dealing damage to all nearby enemies.
